career.title: Career
career.description_2: I'm glad you're interested to know more about me and my career, here you'll see a preview of my career as a Software Engineer and the jouney I walked through, if you wanna know more about me, please don't hesitate to contact me or look into my linkedin for more details and full description of my jobs.

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: I've been implementing high-quality features that significantly impact both scale and product performance. Additionally, I monitor and enhance our Service Level Objectives (SLOs) and Datadog Synthetic tests to ensure the reliability and observability of our product.

jobs.title: Team Lead / Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: I've worked on candidate mobile app and candidate web apps, leading projects, multi functional team, best practices and much more

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: I've worked on KYC (Know Your Customer) project, a large web app that onboards millions of customer every year

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: I've worked on candidate web apps delivering new high quality features to meet the candidates needs

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: I've worked on Slimming World and Adidas projects, having direct impact in two large web applications, delivering new features with quality and speed

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: I've worked on multiple projects related to transport in Brazil, delivering metrics and statistics to help executive teams to make decisions

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: I've worked on clinic systems, implemented and maintained the systems, helping thousands of clinics to manage their businesses

content.title: Lead & Software Engineer
content.description: Hi there, I'm Gus! and I have been working with web development for quite some time, I'm graduated in Information Systems and also in Technical Programming. I am quite passionate about what I do, and having a background with database, backend, frontend, full-stack and mobile development is what makes me a great engineer, besides that I love working in an agile way, leading teams, helping them to achieve their goals and contribute to their professional growth. Would you like to know more about me? Check it out my {link1} and {link2}.
